classmethod set_stop_flag(_dir)[source]¶
classmethod start_sleeper_stall(dut_results_path, _sleep_time=0.1, _stall_threshold=0.15, _raise_stop_threshold=5000, _runtime=600)[source]¶

Start sleeper stall measurement and save logs to local directiory. The function sleeps for ‘_sleep_time’ time and meausre the time it wakes up again. @param dut_results_path - directory to store sleeper stall results _sleep_time - time to sleep, default to 100 ms _stall_threshold - time difference between the time ‘call’ expected to

return and when it actully returned, default to 150 ms, all the entries which have return time greater then threshold is recorded as sleeper stall.

_raise_stop_threshold - Threshold to stop the sleaperstall _runtime - Time to run SleeperStall
